content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

--Querying data from Delta files
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
AS trip_data

--Getting the data types for each column
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk ''trip_data_green_delta'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''calendar_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
)
AS trip_data'

--Generating the error when tying to give the folder names also
--Error is "Content of directory on path 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.blob.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/trip_data_green_delta/year=2020/_delta_log/*.json' cannot be listed."
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk 'trip_data_green_delta/year=2020',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
AS trip_data

--Correcting the data types
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
WITH (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME,
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME,
    store_and_fwd_flag char(1),
    RatecodeID int,
    PULocationID int,
    DOLocationID int,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    year char(4),
    month char(2)
)
AS trip_data


--Selecting only few columns from the select list
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    Bulk 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
WITH (
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(2)
)
AS trip_data
